Posts.Content: I am not sure that everyone would agree with your conclusion that "DCIS is not cancer and not life threatening." I know my oncologist wouldn't. My oncologist considers it cancer but not life threatening in the sense that it has not become invasive. Thyroid cancer that hasn't left the thyroid isn't life threatening either but its still cancer and has potential of being both invasive and life threatening.
Posts.Title: DCIS surgery necessary?
